statements: UPDATE employee_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET skills='Java, Python', experience_years=5 WHERE employee_id=102;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET skills='Java, Python, SQL' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE employee_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', experience_years=5, training_records='Certified Scrum Master' WHERE employee_id=203;
UPDATE EmployeeProfiles SET employee_name = 'John Doe', employee_experience = 3 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE TrainingRecords SET date_completed = '2022-10-15', training_description = 'Advanced SQL' WHERE training_id = 201;
UPDATE EmployeeProfiles SET employee_name = 'John Doe', employee_experience = 5 WHERE employee_id = 123
UPDATE TrainingRecords SET training_description = 'Advanced Python Programming', date_completed = '2022-10-15' WHERE training_id = 456
UPDATE employees SET experience_years = 5 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE projects SET team_lead = 103, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 201;
UPDATE employees SET skills = ARRAY['Java', 'Python', 'SQL'], experience_years = 5 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE projects SET start_date = '2023-02-01', team_lead = 102 WHERE project_id = 201;
UPDATE employees SET skills = ARRAY['Java', 'Python'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE employee_positions SET start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE employee_id = 1 AND position_id = 2;
UPDATE employees SET experience = experience + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE employee_positions SET start_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE employee_id = 1 AND position_id = 2;
UPDATE EmployeeProfiles SET phone_number='123-456-7890', skills='Java, SQL' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE Experience SET description='Managed projects, led team members' WHERE experience_id=5;
UPDATE EmployeeProfiles SET phone_number='555-1234' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE Experience SET job_title='Senior Developer', description='Lead role in project' WHERE employee_id=105 AND experience_id=201;
